pages.title: Armor Crates
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Armor Crates$() are craftable boxes that contain transmogs relating to a mod in the modpack, each crate contains a gear piece for each armor slot.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Armor Crates$() are simple crafting recipes but usually require fairly in-depth modded resources from the Mod you are creating the Crate from.
